title: Life of Geoffrey Chaucer
description: One of four volumes.  \'Life of Geoffrey Chaucer, the Early English Poet\' including memoirs of his near friend and kinsman, John of Gaunt, Duke of Lancaster:  with sketches of the Manners, Opinions, Arts and Literature of England in the Fourteenth Century.  London:  Richard Phillips.
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Wayne H. MacFarlane
